abstract: Some would argue that London's cycling credentials are on the rise, and so it's fitting that the annual Bicycle Film Festival makes its return to London, Oct. 5 to 9, in various locations around the city.
snippet: Some would argue that London's cycling credentials are on the rise, and so it's fitting that the annual Bicycle Film Festival makes its return to London, Oct. 5 to 9, in various locations around the city.
lead_paragraph: London did not make USA Today's "10 Great Places for City Cycling" list this July. But the city's did earn a top-20 mention in a more European-focused Danish report on the best bicycle-friendly cities. Combined with local efforts to promote cycling in anticipation of the upcoming 2012 Olympics, some would argue that London's cycling credentials are on the rise.

headline.main: London Film Festival Rolls in on Two Wheels
